attributes.action: I want to petition the manufacturing of beer in pint cans and bottles.
attributes.additional_details: To distinguish British measures and show the world that we have our own standards.
attributes.background: Ask companies to brew ale in pints instead of litres as pints are more British and will fill our pint glasses properly,.

rejection.details: The Government is not responsible for the size of cans and bottles that beer manufacturers produce. Manufacturers can already produce and sell pint cans and bottles if they want.
